alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lea County through 515 PM MDT... At 433 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Maljamar, or 19 miles west of Lovington, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Lea County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County
